author: David Kemp <davidbkemp@gmail.com> (https://github.com/davidbkemp)
name: animated-qubits
description: Library to support the animation of quantum computation.

scripts.test: jshint --config jshintConfig.json animatedQubits.js lib spec examples/simpleImports/js examples/usingRequire/js && jasmine-node spec
scripts.clean: rm -rf app; rm -rf node_modules; find . -name bower_components -exec rm -r {} \;
